it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model.player

Class Family

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model.player.Family

  • public class Family
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to store the set of the Family Members of a Player Exposes methods to set, increase and get the value of each family member.
    Author:
    fabri

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Family(PlayerColor playerId)
      The members are stored in an EnumMap that maps each value of the MembersColor enum to the corresponding Family Member.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FamilyMember getMember(MembersColor color)
      Returns the Family Member of the specified color.
      int getMemberValueWithServants(int servants, MembersColor color)
      Returns the value of the member, modified by the number of servants used.
      void roundReset()
      Resets all the Family members' values to 0 and sets their state to NOT USED.
      void setServantsForOne(int servantsForOne)
      Sets the number of servants required to increase by one the value of an action
      boolean useMember(FamilyMember membToUse)
      If the family has not been used, it sets it as used.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Family

        public Family(PlayerColor playerId)
        The members are stored in an EnumMap that maps each value of the MembersColor enum to the corresponding Family Member.

    • Method Detail

      • getMember

        public FamilyMember getMember(MembersColor color)
        Returns the Family Member of the specified color.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the family member required
        Returns:
        the family member

      • useMember

        public boolean useMember(FamilyMember membToUse)
        If the family has not been used, it sets it as used.
        Parameters:
        membToUse -
        Returns:
        true if it succeeds, false if the Family Member was already used.

      • roundReset

        public void roundReset()
        Resets all the Family members' values to 0 and sets their state to NOT USED. This method uses FamilyMember.setValue() to reset the value of the members, hence the value of the fixed members is not resetted.

      • setServantsForOne

        public void setServantsForOne(int servantsForOne)
        Sets the number of servants required to increase by one the value of an action
        Parameters:
        servantsForOne -

      • getMemberValueWithServants

        public int getMemberValueWithServants(int servants,
                                      MembersColor color)
        Returns the value of the member, modified by the number of servants used. You should always use this method when you need to increase the value of a member through servants: if you don't use this method and manually add the servants to the member's value, you won't take into account the modifiers.
        Parameters:
        servants - used in the action
        color - color of the family member used.
        Returns:
        the value of the member, modified by the number of servants used.
